Franklins farevvell to the vvorld, vvith his Christian contrition in prison, before his death Franklin, James, d. 1615.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
For Henry Gosson, Printed at London : [1615?]
In verse. Suggested publication date from STC. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
